name: Sh33p
description:
A simple prototype made in less than 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

***

Controls:

WASD to move

R to restart the level

Esc to return to the main menu

***

Your goal is to bring the required number of sheep to safety and achieve the highest score you can. Be careful, however! If you get to close to a sheep you will eat it. After eating a sheep or getting it to safety, all the others will get scared and run faster; your movement speed also increases.

***

Rant: I usually spend too much time coding mechanics for my games. This time I thought I'd try to make something playable as fast as I can... This is the result. I know it's sloppy. Also, due to lack of time, the sprites were rushed and there is no music... I'm sorry about that.
